content: पीडनं [पीड् भावे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Paining, distressing, oppressing, inflicting pain; <ls>Ms. 9. 299</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 345.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) Squeezing, pressing; दोर्वल्लिबंधनिबिडस्तनपीडनानि <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; दंतौष्ठपीडननखक्षतरक्तसिक्तां <ls>Ch. P. 44.</ls> ({%b%}) Pressure; <ls>Māl. 9. 38.</ls> {@--3@} An instrument for pressing. {@--4@} Taking, holding, seizing; as in करपीडन or पाणिपीडन <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--5@} Laying waste, devastation. {@--6@} Threshing corn. {@--7@} An eclipse; as in ग्रहपीडन <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--8@} Suppressing sounds, a fault in the pronunciation of vowels.
